translations: [建]施工人员（builder 的复数）；生成器

sentences.translation: 一些建筑商为他们的工作担保。

sentences.sentence: I hate having builders botch up repairs on my house.
sentences.translation: 我痛恨建筑工人笨手笨脚地修理我的房子。

sentences.sentence: The body was discovered when builders excavated the area.
sentences.translation: 建筑工人挖地时发现了这具尸体。
